full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 759 Filed 08/10/22 Page 222 of 267 2250 LCACmax7 Swain - direct 1 A. She was a junior in high school. 2 MS. POMERANTZ: Ms. Drescher, can we please pull up what's already in evidence as Government Exhibit 101. 3 Q. Ms. Swain, who's the person in this photograph? 4 A. Annie. 5 Q. Is this a fair and accurate photograph of Annie when she 6 was in high school? 7 A. Yes. 8 MS. POMERANTZ: Ms. Drescher, we can take that down. 9 Thank you very much. 10 Q. At that time, did you have conversations with Annie about 11 preparing for college? 12 A. Yes, we talked about college. 13 Q. What was your plan for paying for college for Annie? 14 A. Student loans. 15 Q. In 1995, where was Maria living? 16 A. In New York. 17 Q. What did Maria do for work in New York? 18 A. She was an artist. 19 Q. Who did Maria work for in New York? 20 MS. MENNINGER: Objection. Hearsay. 21 THE COURT: Sustained. 22 Q. Did there come a time when you spoke with Jeffrey Epstein 23 on the phone? 24 A. Yes. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013813
